## Summary sheet ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Main use-cases Bespoke code to perform analysis functionalities not currently implemented in available analysis tools
Authors PlasmoGenEpi
Latest version
License
Website https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/PGEcore/
Code repository https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/PGEcore
Publication
Tutorial authors
Tutorial date
````` ::: ::: ## Purpose The `PGEcore` bespoke scripts perform functionalities not currently fulfilled by any available tool. ## Existing resources The [`PGEcore` GitHub repository](https://github.com/nianqiaoju/snp-slice) includes more details on each bespoke script, including usage. See: - [Estimate naive COI](https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/PGEcore/scripts/estimate_coi_naive/) - [Estimate naive single-locus allele frequency](https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/PGEcore/scripts/estimate_allele_frequency_naive/) - [Estimate naive single-locus allele prevalence](https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/PGEcore/scripts/estimate_allele_prevalence_naive/) - [Estimate naive multi-locus genotype frequency and prevalence](https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/PGEcore/scripts/multilocus_prevfreq_naive) (*note to self: these links will be broken until PGEcore merged to main, but should be ready to go once PGEcore is live*) ## Citation
